data.title: List of Mountain West Player of the Year Winners
data.meta_description: Full list of Mountain West Player of the Year winners, including links to school pages, back to the first award, Utah's Alex Jensen in 2000.
data.text:
The Mountain West Conference (MWC) has awarded Mountain West Player of the Year honors every season since 1999-00. No players have won the award multiple times, so far. BYU and San Diego State are the programs with the most winners (five each), followed by Utah and New Mexico (four each). See also: Mountain West Coach of the Year

Year Player(s) School(s) 2000 Alex Jensen Utah 2001 Mekeli Wesley BYU 2002 Britton Johnsen Utah (2) 2003 Ruben Douglas New Mexico 2004 Rafael Araújo BYU (2) Nick Welch Air Force 2005 Andrew Bogut Utah (3) 2006 Brandon Heath San Diego State 2007 Keena Young BYU (3) 2008 Lee Cummard BYU (4) J. R. Giddens New Mexico (2) 2009 Luke Nevill Utah (4) 2010 Darington Hobson New Mexico (3) 2011 Jimmer Fredette BYU (5) 2012 Jamaal Franklin San Diego State (2) 2013 Kendall Williams New Mexico (4) 2014 Xavier Thames San Diego State (3) 2015 Derrick Marks Boise State 2016 Marvelle Harris Fresno State 2017 Gian Clavell Colorado State 2018 Caleb Martin Nevada 2019 Sam Merrill Utah State 2020 Malachi Flynn San Diego State (4) 2021 Matt Mitchell San Diego State (5) 2022 David Roddy Colorado State (2) 2023 Omari Moore San José State 2024 Great Osobor Utah State (2) 2025
